zh: 这条路从那一点开始陡峭地上升。

en: The road bends sharply to the right at this point.
zh: 这条路在这一点急剧向右弯曲。

en: The road goes north from here.
zh: 这条路从这里向北延伸。

en: The road was jammed with various kinds of cars.
zh: 路上挤满了各种各样的汽车。

en: Many accidents resulted from the icy conditions of the road.
zh: 道路结冰导致了很多事故。

en: You cannot be too careful when crossing the street.
zh: 过马路时再小心也不为过。

en: You cannot be too careful in crossing the street.
zh: 过马路时再小心也不为过。

en: If you throw trash on the road, you have to pay a fine of up to 500 dollars.
zh: 如果你在路上乱扔垃圾，你必须支付高达500美元的罚款。

en: Don't play in the street.
zh: 不要在街上玩耍。

en: It's a rare thing to run into a famous musician on the street.
zh: 在街上偶遇一位著名的音乐家是很罕见的事情。

en: The street is like a tunnel of a paper flowers.
zh: 这条街就像一个纸花隧道。

en: They had cleared the obstacle from the road.
zh: 他们已经清除了道路上的障碍物。

en: The road is dusty. It cannot have rained yesterday.
zh: 路面很脏，昨天一定没下雨。

en: Who that has reason will listen to such a mad man?
zh: 哪个有理智的人会听这种疯子的话？

en: I will do anything within reason.
zh: 我会做任何合理的事情。

en: No wonder they turned down her offer.
zh: 难怪他们拒绝了她的提议。

en: No wonder you are so happy.
zh: 难怪你这么高兴。

en: A moral person doesn't lie, cheat, or steal.
zh: 一个有道德的人不会撒谎、欺骗或偷窃。

en: In Japan, moral education is necessary.
zh: 在日本，道德教育是必要的。

en: He is described as a moralist.
zh: 他被描述成一个道德家。

en: I wish you a good journey.
zh: 祝你旅途愉快。

en: A police car has stopped on the side of the road.
zh: 一辆警车停在路边。

en: There were white and yellow flowers at the side of the road.
zh: 路边有白色和黄色的花。

en: Do you know how to get there?
zh: 你知道怎么去那里吗？

en: Don't handle these tools roughly.
zh: 不要粗暴地使用这些工具。

en: Don't handle the tools roughly.
zh: 不要粗暴地使用这些工具。

en: Got the tools in my pocket.
zh: 工具在我的口袋里。

en: Is it possible to rent equipment?
zh: 可以租用设备吗？

en: What is a workman without his tools?
zh: 没有工具的工人算什么？

en: We wandered from the course.
zh: 我们偏离了路线。

en: Let's live it up!
zh: 让我们好好享受吧！

en: The clown made a funny face.
zh: 小丑做了个滑稽的表情。

en: The clown's stunts were highly amusing to the boys.
zh: 小丑的特技非常逗孩子们开心。

en: You are very kind to show me the way.
zh: 你真好，给我指路。

en: It is very kind of you to show me the way.
zh: 你真好，给我指路。

en: Walking along the street, I saw the accident.
zh: 走在街上，我看到了那场事故。

en: Let's cross the street.
zh: 我们过马路吧。

en: You lead the way and I will follow you.
zh: 你带路，我跟着你。

en: Try to be as polite as you can when asking directions.
zh: 问路的时候尽量礼貌一点。

en: Make way, please.
zh: 请让一让。

en: I'll show you the way.
zh: 我来给你带路。

en: Could you tell me the way?
zh: 请问一下路怎么走？

en: Can you explain the way to me?
zh: 你能给我解释一下怎么走吗？

en: Will you please show me the way?
zh: 请你给我指一下路好吗？

en: Would you tell me the way?
zh: 你能告诉我怎么走吗？

en: Make way for the children, please.
zh: 请给孩子们让一让。

en: Keep out of the way, please.
zh: 请不要挡道。

en: Look both ways before you cross the street.
zh: 过马路前要左右看。

en: You must take care when you cross the road.
zh: 你过马路的时候一定要小心。

en: The dog crossing the road was run over by a bus.
zh: 一只过马路的狗被公共汽车撞了。

en: Move along, please!
zh: 请往前走！

en: I hope that he will find his way easily.
zh: 我希望他能很容易地找到路。

en: There will be an answer.
zh: 总会有答案的。

en: The road parallels the river.
zh: 这条路与河流平行。

en: The road ascends to the village.
zh: 这条路通往村庄。

en: The way is free for an advance.
zh: 前进的道路是畅通的。

en: The path turns sharply at the bridge.
zh: 小路在桥边急转弯。

en: The road descends slowly.
zh: 这条路缓缓下降。

en: The road continues for many miles.
zh: 这条路绵延数英里。

en: The road curves gently toward the lake.
zh: 这条路缓缓地弯向湖边。

en: The road climbed gradually.
zh: 这条路逐渐升高。

en: The road was quite muddy, and, what is worse, it began to rain.
zh: 这条路非常泥泞，更糟糕的是，开始下雨了。

en: The road was very rough.
zh: 路非常颠簸。

en: The road rises from there.
zh: 路从那里开始向上延伸。

en: The path ascends steeply from there.
zh: 小路从那里开始陡峭地上升。

en: The road is uphill all the way.
zh: 一路都是上坡路。

en: The road divides here into two.
zh: 这条路在这里分成两条。

en: The road ascends gently here.
zh: 这条路在这里缓缓上升。

en: The road was crowded with trucks.
zh: 路上挤满了卡车。

en: Pull over to the side, please.
zh: 请靠边停车。

en: I must have lost my key along the way.
zh: 我一定是把钥匙丢在路上了。

en: I must've lost my key along the way.
zh: 我一定是把钥匙丢在路上了。

en: Meeting strangers is one of the pleasures of a trip.
zh: 与陌生人相遇是旅行的乐趣之一。

en: A broken-down car was standing in the middle of the road.
zh: 一辆抛锚的汽车停在路中间。

en: I pulled my car to the left side of the road.
zh: 我把车靠到路的左边。

en: You'll have to try the store across the street.
zh: 你得去街对面的商店试试。

en: There goes a hot little number across the street.
zh: 街对面走过一个性感的美女。

en: I'm lost. Could you direct me to the station?
zh: 我迷路了。你能告诉我火车站怎么走吗？

en: I got lost.
zh: 我迷路了。

en: Are you lost?
zh: 你迷路了吗？

en: Losing the way, he chose the road at random.
zh: 他迷路了，随意选择了一条路。

en: We lost our way, and what was worse, we were caught in a shower.
zh: 我们迷路了，更糟糕的是，我们还遇到了阵雨。

en: A lost dog strayed into our neighborhood yesterday.
zh: 昨天一只走失的狗闯入了我们的社区。

en: If you lose your way, ask a policeman.
zh: 如果你迷路了，就问警察。

en: Take a map with you in case you get lost.
zh: 带上一张地图，以防万一迷路。

en: They carried a map with them in case they should lose their way.
zh: 他们带了一张地图，以防万一迷路。

en: They set out with a guide just in case they lost their way.
zh: 他们请了一个向导出发，以防万一迷路。

en: We carried a map with us in case we should lose our way.
zh: 我们带着地图，以防迷路。

en: We carried a map with us in case we got lost.
zh: 我们带着地图，以防迷路。

en: Don't throw away cans on the street.
zh: 不要在街上乱扔罐子。

en: I seem to be lost.
zh: 我好像迷路了。

en: Walk along the street and turn left at the third intersection.
zh: 沿着这条街走，在第三个十字路口左转。

en: I greet my teacher on the street.
zh: 我在街上向我的老师问好。

en: I found a dollar in the street.
zh: 我在街上捡到了一美元。

en: I just ran into her on the street.
zh: 我刚才在街上碰见她了。

en: I just met her on the street.
zh: 我刚才在街上遇到她了。

en: As they didn't know the way, they soon got lost.
zh: 因为他们不认识路，所以很快就迷路了。

en: As the road was wet, the car must have slipped sideways.
zh: 因为路面湿滑，汽车一定是侧滑了。

en: The road is icy, so take care.
zh: 路面结冰了，小心点。

en: The road dips suddenly.
zh: 这条路突然下沉。

en: The road declines sharply.
zh: 这条路急剧下降。

en: The bad roads prohibit speeding.
zh: 糟糕的路况禁止超速行驶。

en: The bus jolted over the rough road.
zh: 公共汽车在崎岖的道路上颠簸。

en: If you don't know the way, ask a policeman.
zh: 如果你不认识路，就问警察。

en: We came to a place where the road branched into two lanes.
zh: 我们来到一个地方，道路分成两条车道。

en: I will mentally return to childhood and do it all over again.
zh: 我会在精神上回到童年，重新来过。

en: When a big ape emerged from the cave, they got frightened and ran away.
zh: 当一只大猩猩从洞穴里出来时，他们吓坏了，跑开了。

en: We heard somber hollow sounds from the cave.
zh: 我们听到从洞穴里传来的低沉空洞的声音。

en: The fuse lit at once.
zh: 导火索立刻点燃了。

en: Walk tall, son.
zh: 儿子，挺起胸膛走路。

en: Like breeds like.
zh: 物以类聚。

en: I would like to express our thanks on behalf of my colleagues.
zh: 我谨代表我的同事们表示感谢。

en: A colleague has every advantage over me.
zh: 一个同事在各方面都比我更有优势。

en: My colleagues welcomed me very warmly.
zh: 我的同事们非常热情地欢迎我。

en: The allies condemned the invasion as a violation of UN resolutions.
zh: 盟国谴责这次入侵是对联合国决议的违反。

en: The allies defeated the evil empire in the fierce battle.
zh: 盟军在激烈的战斗中击败了邪恶帝国。

en: We fixed the date for our class reunion.
zh: 我们确定了同学聚会的日期。

en: You mind if I join you?
zh: 你介意我加入你吗？

en: Would you mind if I join you?
zh: 你介意我加入你吗？

en: Mind if I join you?
zh: 介意我加入你吗？

en: They moved in together?
zh: 他们同居了吗？

en: Nothing is as important as compassion.
zh: 没有什么比同情心更重要。

en: Sympathy is a feeling characteristic of mankind.
zh: 同情心是人类特有的一种情感。

en: I cannot help crying for sympathy.
zh: 我忍不住同情地哭了。

en: Never confuse pity with love.
zh: 永远不要把怜悯和爱混淆。

en: You often find that sympathy gives place to love.
zh: 你经常会发现同情会变成爱。

en: You often find that sympathy turns into love.
zh: 你经常会发现同情会变成爱。

en: I would very much appreciate receiving a copy of the book.
zh: 我非常希望收到这本书的副本。

en: The company is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange.
zh: 该公司在东京证券交易所上市。

en: The company incurred a deficit of $400 million during the first quarter.
zh: 该公司第一季度亏损了4亿美元。

en: The company has decided to sell some of its money-losing units.
zh: 该公司已决定出售其一些亏损部门。

en: The company produces soy sauce and other food products.
zh: 该公司生产酱油和其他食品。

en: The company is managed by my elder brother.
zh: 这家公司由我哥哥管理。

en: The company is managed by my older brother.
zh: 这家公司由我哥哥管理。

en: The company has a monopoly on the nation's tobacco business.
zh: 该公司垄断了全国的烟草业务。

en: That is a well-managed company.
zh: 那是一家管理良好的公司。

en: The company went out of business after many years of declining profits.
zh: 这家公司在多年利润下滑后倒闭了。

en: The company earned $300 million on sales of $4,000 million.
zh: 该公司销售额达40亿美元，盈利3亿美元。

en: The company went public and became listed on the stock exchange in 1990.
zh: 该公司于1990年上市，并在证券交易所挂牌。

en: The company is equally owned by the two groups.
zh: 该公司由两个集团平均持有股份。

en: Sales at the company zoomed thanks to brisk export demand, but profit did not keep up because of intense competition.
zh: 由于出口需求旺盛，公司销售额猛增，但由于竞争激烈，利润未能跟上。

en: The company's immediate priority is to expand the market share.
zh: 该公司目前的当务之急是扩大市场份额。

en: The company's fourth quarter results sharply improved from the preceding quarter.
zh: 该公司第四季度业绩较上一季度大幅改善。

en: The launching of the company was in 1950.
zh: 该公司成立于1950年。

en: The company crafted a new product.
zh: 该公司精心打造了一款新产品。

en: The company announced a profit of $200 million after tax.
zh: 该公司宣布税后利润为2亿美元。

en: The company's exports to India amounted to $100 million last year.
zh: 去年该公司对印度的出口额达1亿美元。

en: The company's capital expenditure program is set to be 10 billion yen for this year.
zh: 该公司今年的资本支出计划定为100亿日元。

en: The management of a company offered a 5% pay increase to the union.
zh: 一家公司的管理层向工会提出加薪5%的方案。

en: What is the company's competitive advantage?
zh: 该公司的竞争优势是什么？

en: Simultaneous translation broke linguistic walls.
zh: 同声传译打破了语言障碍。

en: At the same time, he began to run.
zh: 与此同时，他开始跑步。

en: Her dream is to become a simultaneous interpreter.
zh: 她的梦想是成为一名同声传译员。

en: You can't do two things at once.
zh: 你不能同时做两件事。

en: The boys rushed for the door at the same time.
zh: 男孩们同时冲向门口。

en: We all stood up at once.
zh: 我们立刻都站了起来。

en: Don't love two people at a time.
zh: 不要同时爱两个人。

en: You can't be at two places at once.
zh: 你不能同时出现在两个地方。

en: Don't do two things at a time.
zh: 不要一次做两件事。

en: Business results of the company were much better than other companies in the industry.
zh: 该公司的经营业绩远好于业内其他公司。

en: On behalf of our classmates, I welcome you.
zh: 我代表我们班的同学，欢迎你。

en: Her classmates do not appreciate her.
zh: 她的同学们并不欣赏她。

en: Suicides of high school students as a result of bullying continued one after another.
zh: 因霸凌而导致的高中生自杀事件接连发生。

en: When one of my coworkers starts racking up good sales figures I can't let down my guard.
zh: 每当我的同事开始取得良好的销售业绩时，我就不能放松警惕。

en: The same phenomenon has been observed.
zh: 已经观察到同样的现象。

en: I say the same thing over and over.
zh: 我总是重复同样的话。

en: You can find the same thing anywhere.
zh: 你可以在任何地方找到同样的东西。

en: The evening of the same day saw our bus reach the scene of the accident.
zh: 同一天晚上，我们的巴士到达了事故现场。

en: The same explanation is true of that case.
zh: 同样的解释也适用于那个案例。

en: To different minds, the same world is a hell, and a heaven.
zh: 对于不同的人来说，同一个世界既是地狱，也是天堂。

en: It becomes hell and heaven even if the hearts who see the same worl mistake.
zh: 即使看到同一个世界的人们产生了误解，世界也会变成地狱和天堂。

en: No two men are of a mind.
zh: 人心各不同。

en: Monotony develops when you harp on the same string.
zh: 如果你老是重复同一件事，就会变得单调乏味。

en: The same is true of Japan.
zh: 日本的情况也是如此。

en: The same applies to my class.
zh: 这同样适用于我的班级。

en: The same is true of the nation.
zh: 国家的情况也是如此。

en: The same can be said of many other persons.
zh: 许多其他人也是如此。

en: The same thing could be said about many other people.
zh: 关于许多其他人也可以这么说。

en: The same cause does not always give rise to the same effect.
zh: 同样的起因并不总是产生相同的结果。

en: The same cause often gives rise to different effects.
zh: 同样的起因常常会产生不同的结果。

en: See to it that you never make the same mistake again.
zh: 注意不要再犯同样的错误。

en: See to it that you don't make the same mistake.
zh: 注意别犯同样的错误。

en: Not a few students made the same mistake.
zh: 不少学生犯了同样的错误。

en: In an essay similarly devoted to allegorical procedures in contemporary art, Buchloh discusses 6 women artists.
zh: 在另一篇同样致力于当代艺术中寓言程序的文章中，布赫洛讨论了6位女性艺术家。

en: Conformity is an essential element of our homogeneous community.
zh: 一致性是我们同质社区的重要组成部分。

en: Many a person has had the same experience.
zh: 许多人都经历过同样的事情。

en: The tragedy must be remembered so that it isn't repeated.
zh: 必须铭记这场悲剧，以避免重蹈覆辙。

en: Simply repeating the same method won't do any good.
zh: 简单地重复同样的方法不会有任何好处。

en: I am going in the same direction. Come with me. I will take you there.
zh: 我和你走同一个方向。跟我来，我带你过去。

en: Let me buy you a new one.
zh: 我给你买个新的吧。

en: Not to harp on the same string, I still insist that those who drink should never drive.
zh: 我不想老调重弹，但我仍然坚持认为喝酒的人不应该开车。

en: You're wasting your time with all this needless repetition so spare us the long-winded explanation.
zh: 你这样无谓的重复是在浪费时间，所以省省你的长篇大论吧。

en: If you do that the again I'll beat the pants off you.
zh: 你要是再那样做，我就揍你屁股。

en: I am tired of hearing the same thing so often.
zh: 我听腻了同样的话。

en: The same may be said of other people.
zh: 同样的话也可以对其他人说。

en: The same thing holds good for the younger generation.
zh: 同样的道理也适用于年轻一代。

en: You can see the same thing on the playing field.
zh: 你可以在运动场上看到同样的事情。

en: The same holds good of us students.
zh: 这对我们学生也适用。

en: The same is true of professional baseball.
zh: 职业棒球也是如此。

en: I often experience palpitations of the heart.
zh: 我经常感到心悸。

en: The animals were busy collecting nuts.
zh: 动物们正忙着收集坚果。

en: Zoology deals with the study of animal life.
zh: 动物学是研究动物生命的学科。

en: Zoology and botany deal with the study of life.
zh: 动物学和植物学是研究生命的学科。

en: Could you tell me the way to the zoo?
zh: 请问去动物园怎么走？

en: The zoo is in the east of the town.
zh: 动物园在城镇的东边。

en: I'd like to go to the zoo.
zh: 我想去动物园。

en: Are there many animals in the zoo?
zh: 动物园里有很多动物吗？

en: There are many kinds of animals in the zoo.
zh: 动物园里有很多种动物。

en: Some animals are producing offspring in zoos.
zh: 一些动物正在动物园里繁殖后代。

en: They keep a lot of animals in the zoo.
zh: 他们在动物园里养了很多动物。

en: A tiger has escaped from the zoo.
zh: 一只老虎从动物园里跑出来了。

en: Put the animals into the cage.
zh: 把动物放进笼子里。

en: I abhor killing animals.
zh: 我厌恶杀害动物。

en: Don't be cruel to animals.
zh: 不要虐待动物。

en: In order to catch animals, they used the bola.
zh: 为了捕捉动物，他们使用了博拉。

en: Animals and plants have the right to live, and men even more so.
zh: 动物和植物都有生存的权利，人类更是如此。

en: Plants and animals require more sunshine than is generally supposed.
zh: 植物和动物需要比通常认为的更多的阳光。

en: Animals live in many places and in great numbers, too.
zh: 动物生活在许多地方，而且数量众多。

en: Animals act on instinct.
zh: 动物凭本能行事。

en: Animals cannot distinguish right from wrong.
zh: 动物无法区分是非。

en: Animals have bodies largely composed of fluid.
zh: 动物的身体主要由液体组成。

en: Animals act in a better manner than wicked humans.
zh: 动物的行为比邪恶的人类更好。

en: Animals can learn and pass on what they learn.
zh: 动物可以学习并传递他们所学到的东西。

en: Animals are afraid of fire.
zh: 动物害怕火。

en: Why do you think animals dread fire?
zh: 你为什么认为动物害怕火？

en: You may think that animals can sleep in any position.
zh: 你可能认为动物可以以任何姿势睡觉。

en: Animals seem to move at random.
zh: 动物似乎在随机移动。

en: Animals cannot exist without air and water.
zh: 没有空气和水，动物就无法生存。

en: Animals lives are no less valuable than our lives are.

zh: 东京的人口超过一千万。

en: The population of Tokyo is larger than that of New York.
zh: 东京的人口比纽约多。

en: How large is the population of Tokyo?
zh: 东京的人口有多少？

en: My parents and little brother, who lived in the suburbs of Tokyo, died in the big earthquake.
zh: 我的父母和弟弟住在东京郊区，在大地震中去世了。

en: Do you have any idea what the population of Tokyo is?
zh: 你知道东京的人口有多少吗？

en: The climate of Tokyo is different from that of London.
zh: 东京的气候和伦敦的气候不一样。

en: During the rush hours in Tokyo, traffic is heavy.
zh: 东京的交通高峰期，交通非常拥堵。

en: It is really hard to pay one's way in a huge city like Tokyo.
zh: 在像东京这样的大城市里，自给自足地生活真的很困难。

en: It's really difficult to survive in a big city like Tokyo without endebting oneself.
zh: 在像东京这样的大城市里，不负债生存真的很困难。

en: There are shuttle buses that stop at several hotels in Tokyo.
zh: 有班车停靠在东京的几家酒店。

en: We were living in Osaka for ten years before we came to Tokyo.
zh: 在我们来东京之前，我们在大阪住了十年。

en: We had lived in Osaka for ten years before we came to Tokyo.
zh: 在我们来东京之前，我们在大阪住了十年。

en: We lived in Osaka for ten years before we came to Tokyo.
zh: 在我们来东京之前，我们在大阪住了十年。

en: I had been in Tokyo only three days when I received news of my father's death.
zh: 我到东京才三天，就收到了我父亲去世的消息。

en: On arriving in Tokyo, I called him up.
zh: 一到达东京，我就给他打了电话。

en: On arriving in Tokyo, I wrote her a letter.
zh: 一到达东京，我就给她写了一封信。

en: I'll drop you a line when I get to Tokyo.
zh: 我到东京后会给你写信的。

en: How would you like to live in Tokyo?
zh: 你觉得住在东京怎么样？

en: Will the typhoon hit Tokyo you suppose?
zh: 你认为台风会袭击东京吗？

en: Foreign businessmen living in Tokyo often complain of the high prices for imported western food.
zh: 住在东京的外国商人经常抱怨进口西方食品的价格很高。

en: I live in Tokyo.
zh: 我住在东京。

en: Having lived in Tokyo, I know the city well.
zh: 因为住在东京，所以我很了解这座城市。

en: It has been as many as ten years since I started to live in Tokyo.
zh: 自从我开始住在东京，已经有十年之久了。

en: When I went to Tokyo, I met him.
zh: 我去东京的时候，我遇到了他。

en: All sorts of people live in Tokyo.
zh: 各种各样的人都住在东京。

en: Many architectural monstrosities are seen in Tokyo.
zh: 在东京可以看到许多丑陋的建筑。

en: When will we arrive in Tokyo?
zh: 我们什么时候到达东京？

en: When will I get to Tokyo?
zh: 我什么时候到达东京？

en: What time will he arrive in Tokyo?
zh: 他什么时候到达东京？

en: What time will you get to Tokyo?
zh: 你什么时候到达东京？

en: Do you live in Tokyo?
zh: 你住在东京吗？

en: While staying in Tokyo, I came to know her.
zh: 在东京逗留期间，我认识了她。

en: My aunt, who lives in Tokyo, sent me a beautiful blouse.
zh: 我住在东京的姑妈寄给我一件漂亮的衬衫。

en: I hope to see you the next time you are in Tokyo.
zh: 我希望下次你来东京的时候能见到你。

en: There is no telling when a severe earthquake will strike Tokyo.
zh: 说不准什么时候东京会发生大地震。

en: There is no knowing when a severe earthquake will happen in Tokyo.
zh: 不知道什么时候东京会发生大地震。

en: In comparison with Tokyo, London is small.
zh: 与东京相比，伦敦很小。

en: London is small compared to Tokyo.
zh: 与东京相比，伦敦很小。

en: Which is larger, Tokyo or Kobe?
zh: 东京和神户哪个更大？

en: What's the number for the Tokyo Dome?
zh: 东京巨蛋的号码是多少？

en: A big earthquake occurred in Tokyo.
zh: 东京发生了一场大地震。

en: They started to sell a new type of car in Tokyo.
zh: 他们开始在东京销售一种新型汽车。

en: I saw a kabuki play in Tokyo.
zh: 我在东京看了一场歌舞伎表演。

en: Tell me what you did in Tokyo.
zh: 告诉我你在东京做了什么。

en: It is difficult to have one's own house in Tokyo.
zh: 在东京拥有一栋自己的房子很难。

en: In Tokyo, wild birds are decreasing in number year by year.
zh: 在东京，野生鸟类的数量逐年减少。

en: Spacious apartments in Tokyo are hard to come by.
zh: 在东京很难找到宽敞的公寓。

en: In Tokyo, the cherry blossoms are in full bloom.
zh: 在东京，樱花盛开了。

en: For some people, home is a cardboard carton in Tokyo.
zh: 对一些人来说，家就是东京的一个纸板箱。

en: I hear that even taxi drivers often get lost in Tokyo.
zh: 我听说即使是出租车司机也经常在东京迷路。

en: In Tokyo, the cold season starts in the middle of November.
zh: 在东京，寒冷的季节从十一月中旬开始。

en: The cost of living is very high in Tokyo.
zh: 东京的生活成本非常高。

en: Have you got used to living in Tokyo?
zh: 你习惯在东京生活了吗？

en: Could you tell me the way to Tokyo Tower?
zh: 你能告诉我怎么去东京塔吗？

en: Do you know where Tokyo Tower is?
zh: 你知道东京塔在哪里吗？

en: There is a direct flight from Tokyo to London.
zh: 有从东京直飞伦敦的航班。

en: How long does it take to fly from Tokyo to Los Angeles?
zh: 从东京飞往洛杉矶需要多长时间？

en: How long is the flight from Tokyo to Hawaii?
zh: 从东京飞往夏威夷的航班要多久？

en: I heard that the distance between Tokyo and Osaka is about 10 km.
zh: 我听说东京和大阪之间的距离大约是10公里。

en: There is an air service between Tokyo and Moscow.
zh: 东京和莫斯科之间有航空服务。

en: The Tokaido line terminates at Tokyo.
zh: 东海道线在东京终止。

en: The final stop of Tokaido line is Tokyo.
zh: 东海道线的终点站是东京。

en: The Tokaido Line was crippled by the typhoon.
zh: 东海道线被台风摧毁了。

en: The New Tokaido Line was completed in 1964.
zh: 新东海道线于1964年竣工。

en: I don't have an account at that branch of Tokai Bank.
zh: 我在东海银行的那个分行没有账户。

en: I do not have any account in the branch office of Tokai bank.
zh: 我在东海银行的那个分行没有任何账户。

en: From which platform does the train to Higasikakogawa leave?
zh: 去东加古川的火车从哪个站台出发？

en: The eastern sky was getting light.
zh: 东方的天空开始发亮了。

en: There is a tinge of red in the eastern sky.
zh: 东方的天空带着一丝红色。

en: I hear some tribes in eastern Africa live on milk products.
zh: 我听说东非的一些部落以奶制品为生。

en: The economies were hit hard by energy price increases.
zh: 能源价格上涨对经济造成了沉重打击。

en: The East Asian economies were hit hard by energy price increases.
zh: 东亚经济体受到能源价格上涨的沉重打击。

en: Where is the check-in counter?
zh: 办理登机手续的柜台在哪里？

en: Can I check in here?
zh: 我可以在这里办理登机手续吗？

en: The people on board thrust their way toward the rear exit.
zh: 船上的人们奋力冲向后方出口。

en: May I see your boarding pass, please?
zh: 请出示您的登机牌。

en: Can you show me your boarding pass?
zh: 你能给我看看你的登机牌吗？

en: Could you please show me your boarding pass?
zh: 请您出示您的登机牌好吗？

en: Here are your boarding pass and your baggage claim.
zh: 这是您的登机牌和行李领取凭证。

en: What's the boarding time?
zh: 登机时间是什么时候？

en: Where is the boarding lounge?
zh: 登机休息室在哪里？

en: From which gate do I board?
zh: 我从哪个登机口登机？

en: It cannot reasonably be assumed that decreasing the dose would reduce the risk of side-effects.
zh: 不能合理地认为减少剂量会降低副作用的风险。

en: The result of the poll will be known soon.
zh: 民意调查的结果很快就会公布。

en: The poll was taken yesterday.
zh: 民意调查是昨天进行的。

en: The result of the vote was a win for the Liberals.
zh: 投票结果是自由党获胜。

en: Are you old enough to vote?
zh: 你够年龄投票吗？

en: We'll decide by voting.
zh: 我们将通过投票来决定。

en: Investment bankers are tearing their hair out over the crash.
zh: 投资银行家正为这次崩盘而焦头烂额。

en: An investors' group is attempting a leveraged buy-out of the firm.
zh: 一个投资者团体正试图对该公司进行杠杆收购。

en: The return on the investment will be high.
zh: 投资回报率会很高。

en: The venturer Edward made his the jackpot in the oil business.
zh: 冒险家爱德华在石油生意中赚了大钱。

en: There's no way off the island.
zh: 没有办法离开这个岛。

en: The pebble I threw skipped along the surface of the water.
zh: 我扔的鹅卵石在水面上跳跃。

en: The island is nearly a mile across.
zh: 这个岛的宽度将近一英里。

en: The island was enveloped in a thick fog.
zh: 这个岛被浓雾笼罩。

en: The island showed black in the moonlight.
zh: 在月光下，岛屿呈现黑色。

en: Island folklore still recounts the story of the raft.
zh: 岛上的民间传说仍然讲述着木筏的故事。

en: The island has a mild climate.
zh: 这个岛气候温和。

en: Do you see that ship near the island?
zh: 你看到岛屿附近的那艘船了吗？

en: An island came in sight.
zh: 一个岛屿进入了视野。

en: The tower leaned slightly to the west.
zh: 这座塔略微向西倾斜。

en: The tower was blown to atoms.
zh: 这座塔被炸成了原子。

en: The picture of the tower was out of focus.
zh: 这张塔的照片失焦了。

en: There's a large clock near the top of the tower.
zh: 在塔顶附近有一个大钟。
